name: Grady Chambers
bio: Grady Chambers was born and raised in Chicago. He is the author of the poetry collection North American Stadiums (Milkweed Editions, 2018). His writing has appeared in Diode Poetry; Forklift, Ohio; Ninth Letter, New Ohio Review, and elsewhere. He was a Wallace Stegner Fellow at Stanford University, attended the MFA program at Syracuse University, and has received fellowships from the Norman Mailer Center and the New York State Summer Writers Institute. Chambers currently lives in Philadelphia.
